body.name: APEVIA 512L-CWH 120mm Silent Dual Rings White LED Fan with 32 x LEDs & 8 x Anti-Vibration Rubber Pads (5 Pk)
body.stockDetail: Only 12 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Apevia 120mm Ultra Silent Black Case Fan w/ 32 x White LED Lights & 8 x Anti-Vibration Rubber Pads ( 4 on Each Side) - 5 Pk
120mm x 120mm x 25mm. Comes with 4pin Molex + 3pin Motherboard Connectors for connecting to Power Supply (4pin) or Motherboard (3pin).
Fan Speed: 1350 ± 10% RPM. Air Flow: 57.67 CFM. Air Power: 12 VDC. Low Noise Level: 24.7 dBA.
Life Expectancy: 25,000 Hour. Case Screws are Included.
5 Color Options: Blue, Green, Red, Pink & White. We also have single pack, 2-in-1 pack and 3-in-1 pack available.
body.description: Improve cooling and airflow of your case/system with this silent Apevia 120mm white LED fan. With 7 black blades and 32 white led lights, it produces better cooling performance and brings out the most magnificent white lights to this fan. Anti-vibration rubber pads on all four corners keep the fan super silent. It offers incredible cooling to increase the longevity and stability of the system and components; meanwhile, adds glamour and character to your PC.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 609 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars decent fans at an excellent price
reviews.reviewText: These fans are a fantastic deal when you consider you are getting 5 fans at this price point.I cannot say how they are after extended use as I have only just installed 2 in my computer within the past day.I have 3 fans in my computer case. One had recently started making noise again. Rather than oil it as I have done in the past when this happened I decided to replace it.I really only needed one fan but, when you add shipping to the lower priced fans that are sold individually the price is a bit too high. And, the average price of budget fans seems to be around 8 dollars for one. That is why this is such a great deal! Five fans at 8 bucks each come to $40 bucks and that is before shipping is added.I got free shipping on these making the deal even better.The lights are far brighter than I expected. I did check out the photos in other reviews but, I must say none of the photos accurately represent just how vivid the color is and how bright the light is.After seeing how the lights looked when I swapped out the noisy fan I decided to swap out the fan in the front of my case even though that one was still working fine. I thought it would look night having more visible light coming through the front of my case (the original fans are the kind with a couple of blue LED's in the center the light pattern is different with these new ones but far more visible through the structure of the case.I did not replace the 3 case fan as the last one is in the back and I really don't see that under normal circumstances.So, I have 3 spare fans in case I need them.Yes, there are better fans on the market but you will pay far more for them.These look great and work as expected.I opted for blue as that is the color of the LED's in my original fans (I had no choice of color when I built my computer, I just bought the least expensive fans they had). Over the years I grew accustomed to that color. However, if the green and red are as vivid in person as these blue ones I think either of those would have been a great color choice too (though that is just an opinion of aesthetics).They are quiet but far from silent.If I have one criticism of these fans it would be the rubber anti-vibration pads. Given that they are part of the structure it is not as if you can test how well they work by using the fans without them compared to with them. Also, the anti-vibration pads are not especially thick so, once you tighten the screws you will tend to compress them enough where I think it is doubtful they have any actual effect when it comes to canceling vibration. A couple of rubber washers could accomplish the same thing in my opinion. Though it would be harder to get washers in place while installing a fan. So, being an actual part of the fan design is good in that aspect.To sum up, if you are in need of some fans these are a very good choice. they are decent fans at an excellent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fans, awesome price
reviews.reviewText: When I was building my pc on parts picker I was struggling to find decent prices plain white LED fans and after looking thru all that was available I seen these for $27 for a set of 5...say less, they were at my front door the next day.Great fan for the money, there not loud at all (although I'm not a noise snob when comes to pc fans) and the white LED is a pretty crisp white. They go well with any white build...led on or off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good customer support, decent fans
reviews.reviewText: One of my 5 fans wouldn’t spin. I contacted support and got a new one after about a week. From reading other reviews it looks like this is pretty common. I still wasn’t super thrilled since I was on a time crunch. But at least the fans run basically silent and look nice. However I know from a previous system that dusting these fans is very difficult due to the large amount of surface area and crevices on the fan blades.Overall these fans are still a great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These things were amazing. I have 8 total fans in my cooling ...
reviews.reviewText: These things were amazing. I have 8 total fans in my cooling loop for two radiators and I was using Cooler Masters and the noise was loud. Really loud. I got these expecting the same level of noise but man was I in for a surprise. These things are like ninjas in the night! The extra padding on the fans makes a BIG difference. I can't tell for sure the amount of air they are pushing though but when I'm running BOINC for SETI@Home they crank up and even at full blast are a lot quieter than my old ones. I'll come back later and update the review when I've got a good time-til-death of how long they actually last. The only thing I would caution about is the light level. These things are pretty bright. With the 8 in my rig, I can light up the room at night and not have to turn the light on. They make a great nightlight for downstairs though so it works for my house. Just be aware they might blind you over time. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good price point but...
reviews.reviewText: Good price point but 2/5 of the LED rings on the fans do not work all the time. One plugged directly into the motherboard on one PC will turn on roughly every other time the PC is on. Sometimes it will start working after 30 minutes or so and sometimes they just stay off. When the LEDs turn on with the PC, they stay on. On another PC, I have installed a couple of these from my 5 pack and one of those does the same except it is plugged in with a splitter to a molex connector. The fans themselves are quiet and work fine. They are not silent but not terribly loud either. Overall I do like them, I just wish the LEDs were on all the time. Nice and bright when they are on and working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexist fans on Amazon
reviews.reviewText: These are literally the sexist computer fans I have ever seen. Just looking at them not on, they are made of some really nice looking, high quality plastic. The blades look really cool, and the fan body has some really interesting geometric shapes that might actually make them stronger but ultimately just look really cool. The anti-vibration pads are an interesting feature that I have never seen in a computer fan before. The pads seem to have some dampening effect and I found that they helped a lot with mounting as they act as non-slip pads as well. The lighting is a another level of amazing. Instead of four LEDs in the corners of the fan they have ribbon LED strips around the circumference of the inside of the fan. They create literally the most amazing lighting effect I have ever seen in a computer fan. The pictures don’t even vaguely do them justice and I know I can’t explain it, but they take on this really fascinating three dimensional vortex of light awesomeness. The power cable was not as nice I might have liked considering how nice the rest of the fan is but it has all the connectors you might need. Finally the price for all five, I think, is a steal considering that five, not nearly as awesome, fans could easily be ten to twenty dollars a piece. Overall these are the best, coolest, and dare I say, sexist fans I have ever had the pleasure to stumble over.
Super silenciosos, muy bonitos y con buen flujo de aire!
I like it have 7 fan in lu computer

Tienen una relación costo - beneficio, excelente. La iluminación es muy buena; el empuje de aire es mejor de lo que se esperaría; son muy silenciosos, los conecte directo a la psu, y apenas si se percibían.El problema fue que cuando los desconecte para reacomodarlos, uno de los pines se safo de un ventilador. Pero por lo demás, totalmente recomendables.

reviews.reviewTitle: LED colours are not as intense as shown
reviews.reviewText: The glow given off by these fans are much softer than depicted in photo. It's a very nice soft pink, matching its rubber pads and fan blades quite well. Fan quality seems good, not too loud. Only down side are the bulky molex connectors; some of which don't seem too well aligned, either. Overall a very satisfactory purchase especially considering the price.
